articles.title: Diabetic Woman No Longer Needs Insulin After Single Dose of Experimental Stem Cells - Futurism
articles.summary: A Canadian woman with type 1 diabetes spent nearly a decade dependent on her glucose monitor and insulin shots — but after a single dose of manufactured stem cells implanted into her liver, she's now free.
